data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Teleorman, Romania that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Teleorman, Romania
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Teleorman, Romania. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, the the state of Teleorman will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Father, help the 20,805 believers in Teleorman to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Jew, Romanian people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 20,805 believers in Teleorman, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Teleorman unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.section_summary:
the state of Teleorman, Romania has a population of 328,700.

We estimate Teleorman has 20,805 people who might know Jesus, 287,041 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 20,854 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Teleorman, Romania.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.
